'''''Amon Hen'' 5''' is the fifth issue of the [[Amon Hen (journal)|''Amon Hen'' journal]] by [[The Tolkien Society]].

==Contents==
: ''All content is by John Martin unless indicated otherwise.''
* "That resigned feeling: Editorial reiteration"
* "Generally a Special Meeting"
* "The Library"
* "''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]''"
* "Northfarthing brings a Smial to the editor" by Nan C. Scott (Melilot Brandybuck)
* "Here come de Mailman" (letters by Andrew Baker, Graham England, Colin Dean, Jim Allan, Gordon Larkin, [[Hartley Patterson]], Rosemary Pardoe, "Gollum," Kevin Hall, Miss P.E.M. Ward, and Pat McIntosh)
* "Hobbit Chunnel"
* "News of Tolkien" by Jessica Kemball-Cook
* "1974 A.G.M. [Annual General Meeting] and Dinner"
* "Innmoot"
* Books
** "Books to borrow" by Peter Herring
** "New Puffins" by Jessica Kemball-Cook
** Review of ''[[Tolkien Criticism: An Annotated Checklist]]'' by [[Richard C. West]]
* "[[Ursual K. Le Guin|Le Guin]] Wins US National Book Award" (reprinted from ''Locus'' 140)
* "Narnia and Middle-earth: Points of Comparison" by Willfoot (Pete Wilde)
* "The Winds of Gondor" (poem by Steve Porter, reprinted from ''Amon Din'' 3: "Hear now the gull cry its song?")
* "The Other Societies"
** "Ða Engliscan Gesiðas" by Archie Mercer
** "North Borneo Frodo Society" by Jim Allan
** "The Fantasy Association" by Jim Allan
* "Magazines"
* "Fourteen-twenty" by Hartley Patterson
* "Final word - until next time"
